suite.name: CasosDeTesteCadastroDeUsuariosBDD

test.name: Cenário 01: Acessar tela de Cadastro de usuários

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Dado que estou na tela de Cadastros de usuários
Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Que estou na tela de Cadastros de usuários
Acessar tela de Cadastros de usuários
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Verificar tela de Cadastro de usuários
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="root"]/div/div/div[1]/h1' contains exact text 'Cadastro de usuários'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Então exibe a tabela Formulário com os campos Nome, E-mail, Senha e o botão Cadastrar
Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Exibe a tabela Formulário com os campos Nome, E-mail, Senha e o botão Cadastrar
Verificar campos da tela de Cadastro de usuários
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
